scripts.prepare: node -e "const fs = require('fs'); const path = require('path'); const { execSync } = require('child_process'); const isWin = process.platform === 'win32'; const huskyBin = isWin ? 'husky.cmd' : 'husky'; const huskyPath = path.join(__dirname, 'node_modules', '.bin', huskyBin); if (fs.existsSync(huskyPath)) { execSync((isWin ? '' : 'node ') + huskyPath + ' install', { stdio: 'inherit', cwd: __dirname }); }"
scripts.build: cd mother-theme && npm run build && cd ../backend && npm run build && cd ../frontend && npm run build
scripts.test: cd mother-theme && npm run test && cd ../backend && npm run test && cd ../frontend && npm run test
scripts.test:coverage: cd mother-theme && npm run test:coverage && cd ../backend && npm run test:coverage && cd ../frontend && npm run test:coverage
scripts.test:watch: cd mother-theme && npm run test:watch & cd ../backend && npm run test:watch & cd ../frontend && npm run test:watch
scripts.bt: cd mother-theme && npm run bt && cd ../backend && npm run bt && cd ../frontend && npm run bt
scripts.bt:watch: cd mother-theme && npm run bt:watch & cd ../backend && npm run bt:watch & cd ../frontend && npm run bt:watch
